resources.string: \n1. Follow the link to be redirected to the Mindletic app home page.

1. Follow the link to be redirected to the Mindletic app home page.

 2. Click "Get Started" and create your account. You can use both your work and personal email for your account.

 3. In the box that pops up, confirm that you are a KTU employee by entering your work email address (please note that the end of the email is already specified, you do not need to repeat it).

 4. You should have received a confirmation email in your work email account. Click on "verify email address".

 5. Go back to the app. If the features are still locked, follow provided link again.

 6. The Mindletic app is free and anonymous. You have access to free consultations with a certified psychologist to help you on your journey towards emotional balance. No one will see what emotions you are marking or who you have had counselling with and when.
